localize.text: Good day, manager! Would you like to expand the Control Department?
Hello manager! Each day you will need to expand one department! Are you ready to open up the Control Department and begin managing Abnormalities?
Greetings manager. Would you like to expand the Information Department and prepare for management?
I am in charge of the Information Team and its department. I'll give you a proper greeting later. Are you planning to open up the Information Department before starting the day?
Hey, you sure you wanna expand Safety before the day starts?
Hey, I’m, uh… the guy in charge of the Safety Team. We can exchange names later. Wanna open up my department and skip over to managing?
Do you want to expand the Training Department and get going with management? I’m sure it’ll be very useful, manager!
Hello manager, I’m in charge of the Training Team! Are you thinking of opening up my department today?
So are you going to expand the Central Command Department today?
Good day manager, we are in charge of the Central Command Team. Will our department be opened up today?
Thinking of expanding Disciplinary today? If you are, let’s do it quickly.
I’m the head of Disciplinary. You opening up my department today?
Gonna expand Welfare today and head onto managing the Abnormalities? Don’t worry, I’m not pushing you or anything. Just chill and take your time…
Morning to you, my good manager sir. I’m in charge of Welfare. Are you going to be opening up my department today?
So you desire to broaden the Extraction Department?
How nice to see you again. As you can see, I’ve been placed as the leader of the Extraction Team. I’m sure we’ll meet again soon.
Hello again. Will you be unfolding more of the Records Team?
Good morning. Here is where the Records Department will be situated, if you decide to open it. In this place, we record and control everything.
